long_description: The MSR Universal Fuel Canister stand improves stability when cooking with a canister stove (sold separately). Broad stainless-steel base of the stand increases stove stability to help prevent spills; works well on uneven ground. Spring-loaded ABS plastic adjustment ensures a fast, easy and reliable fit to most brands and sizes of isobutane fuel canisters (not included). MSR Universal Fuel Canister stand folds flat for easy storage.
short_description: The MSR Universal Fuel Canister stand improves stability when cooking with a canister stove (sold separately).
